talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

$Velskud$
…….
(Velskud is lying down with his eyes closed and his hands grasping his wounds)

$Geraint$
Velskud?
...I don't know why you would mention that name.

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
Little girl, you're quite famous these days.
Haha.

$Elite Soldier Calrim$
Thank you for your help, adventurer.

$Academic Jasmine${sound:npc_SH_Jasmin_sp_06.ogg}
Did you give Velskud the painkiller you've prepared?

$Academic Jasmine$
Did you say Velskud is at the Foothills of Black Mountain? Velskud.
I hope he recovers from the injury soon....

$Elite Soldier Calrim$
Thank you for your help, adventurer.
Rest well in Saint Haven.

$Geraint$
Velskud?
...I don't know why you would mention that name

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
Little girl, you're getting quite famous these days, haha.
You seem busy today.

$Velskud$
It's stupid of me to mingle with a useless child like you.
...Let me ask you one thing. Why is a kid who should be in the future standing here?

${user_nick}$
I was dispatched here to do something.

$Velskud$
Dispatched?
Alone?

${user_nick}$
Yes... (and I'm not a kid)

$Velskud$
Are the people in that future so irresponsible to entrust their future on a child's hands?
Or is the mission so unimportant that even a child can handle it?

${user_nick}$
It's because it was me and my sister who created the time travelling machine.

$Velskud$
Time travel… You mean you were in charge of such a project?
The place you are from is a strange place.

${user_nick}$
I'm actually not a kid.

$Velskud$
.... You're saying, you became a child due to the side effects of time traveling.
Hmm... it's quite reasonable.
Not too much of a nonsense afterall.

${user_nick}$
Then do you believe me?!

$Velskud$
Nothing changes even if I trust you.
With this injured body, I have no choice but to hide for a while.
(Velskud smiles bitterly.)

$Velskud$
.... Go away. If you keep coming here, someday, you'll be in danger.
I'm not the same Velskud you know in the future.

$Academic Jasmine${sound:npc_SH_Jasmin_sp_04.ogg}
Velskud still has no intention of changing his mind.
Revenge? Revenge who... Hmm.

$Academic Jasmine$
This is much more difficult than we had anticipated. We still have too little data.
I was so sure this time, but if you keep going like this, we might not be able to finish our mission in time......

${user_nick}$
In time? Are we out of time?

$Academic Jasmine${sound:npc_SH_Jasmin_sp_05.ogg}
Oh... I mean the time when the Nest is lifted and the Prophet disappears.
Now, go back to the Royal Castle and scan the atmosphere.
You always have to be on the lookout, okay?

$Academic Station$
* Mission Object.
* Go to the Saint Haven Royal Castle.

$Elite Soldier Calrim${action:Talk}
Oh!! Welcome. I was waiting for you to show up.
There is someone who really wants to meet you, {user_nick}.

$Elite Soldier Calrim$
He just said he needs a favour from you. Specifically you and not the other adventurers.
He also had something to ask about his research.

${user_nick}$
Who?

$Elite Soldier Calrim$
Heraldry Scholar Stas. He has been studying the Dragons for a long time.
I think that's why he wants to see you.

$Elite Soldier Calrim${action:Talk}
Did you meet Heraldry Scholar Stas?
He's been doing research on dragons for a long time and that's why he wants to meet you.

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
You finally came. I've been waiting for you a long time.
You're quite famous these days! Haha.

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
A cute little girl achieving great victories in numerous fights!
Even the adventurers who came with you are praising you nonstop.

${user_nick}$
So what can I do for you?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(This kind of information should be strictly kept secret!)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Heraldry Scholar Stas${action:Talk}
Umm, that is... (He lowers his voice and whispers)
From what I've heard... there is a Gold Dragon in the basement of the Royal Castle.
Is it true the Gold Dragon is guarding the Prophet...?

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
I have my own sources. There aren't any rumors going around yet. Soldiers who came back from the Dark Overlord Gate are talking about the dragon, but the military and the Royal Castle are keeping a tight cap on the story.

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
I presume Duke Stuart will make up a pretty story and tell everyone. Those fools.
Dragons are not to be measured by human standards. Even 50 years ago, the Six Heroes made the same mistake.

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
During the Black Dragon Karas raid, they were shaken up when they saw the Gold Dragon in front of them.
Even though it was fighting with them as comrades.

${user_nick}$
(He's talking about Geraint)

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
Karacule and Barnac became furious saying that they were betrayed.
It became chaotic and humans concealed the fact that Geraint, the leader of the Six Heroes was the Gold Dragon.

${user_nick}$
So, you knew about Geraint's true identity?

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
I was there. But, I too couldn't believe my eyes. After that, I've been doing research on dragons, but as I dig deeper, the more confused I got.
It was inevitable since there were no concrete information. In that sense....

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
Could you go meet Geraint and ask him a few questions? I beg you!
There might not be a second chance to ask in person! Don't you think so?

$Heraldry Scholar Stas${action:Talk}
Thank you! Thank you so much!
(Stas hugs you with tears in his eyes.)
Please go and ask him how the dragons are made.

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
I think the Black Dragon that appeared 50 years ago and the one that appeared recently are creations of Ancient Power.
This was my hypothesis, but recently, I became more certain. So I'm curious to know if the other dragons are made that way, too.

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
Please go to the Gold Dragon and ask him. Are all dragons made?
Like Black Dragons, can they be combined using the Ancients' power?

$Geraint$
Humans suspect everything and don't believe easily until they have seen it with their own eyes.
But they are always deceived and are influenced by emotions and delusions.

$Geraint$
...I remember someone said this.
I'm not good with the human language. Even if I answer you, I'm not certain if you can understand all of it.

$Geraint$
The Black Draon was created using a fragment of the Chaos Dragon with the help of Ancients' power.
In human terms, I can say that dragons are "made".

${user_nick}$
Dragons are made?

$Geraint$
But we, Argenta and I, are the descendants of the Ancient Dragon, so we have not been created by force.

$Geraint$
When this world was first created, Goddess Altea created two dragons to serve as mediators of the world. They were Ancient and Chaos Dragon.

$Geraint$
The world created by Goddess Altea used to be beautiful and peaceful under the protection of the two dragons and the good Ancients. However, Goddess Vestinel's jealousy brought darkness to the peaceful Alcheringa.

$Geraint$
When Goddess Altea drank Vestinel's poison, the good Ancients became contaminated by darkness and started to turn corrupt. The evil Beyond Dragon who came from Vestinel's Mistland started to destroy Alcheringa.

${user_nick}$
(Mistland… I've heard of it before)

$Geraint$
Ancient and Chaos barely defeated the Beyond Dragon. But the Chaos dragon got contaminated by Beyond's evil energy. When corrupted Chaos threatened the world once again, Ancient tried to stop Chaos. And the epic battle began....

$Geraint$
...Nobody won. After the battle, Chaos' body was divided into many pieces and was spread all over the world.
Ancient also used too much of its power, so it disintegrated itself...
...To prepare for the future.

${user_nick}$
The future…?

$Geraint$
Argenta and I are the fragments of the Ancient Dragon. Somewhat like "siblings" as you humans like to call it.
Our destiny is to stop the resurrection of Chaos' fragments.

${user_nick}$
Then how about the Monolith?

$Geraint$
.... (Geraint's face darkens.) Humans like you should not try to know about the Monolith.
Forget about it. Argenta is supporting it with all her power.

${user_nick}$
Humans can't approach it? Never?

$Geraint$
......You're right. To reach the Goddess, you need a medium. For those who are not Dragons… for humans, the Monolith will only be used as a tool for destruction and annihilation. So stop your useless curiosity.

${user_nick}$
But I have to go to the Monolith.

$Geraint$
You seem to have a desperate reason.
But.... In any case, I cannot tell you how.

${user_nick}$
Then can the Prophet reach the Monolith?

$Geraint$
Is that the answer you have found? (Geraint does not talk for a while.)
I cannot stop you from finding a way yourself. But I cannot help you.
I'm sorry.

$Geraint$
Now, you should go back to the person waiting for the answers.

$Academic Jasmine$
So Geraint said that… I see... It is impossible for an ordinary human to go to the Monolith. I'm well aware of that. But we can't give up.
The only hope left in our world... lies there.

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
Welcome back.
Did you get Geraint's answer?

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
I see. So the Black Dragon was only one of the Chaos Dragon's broken fragments....
Then dragons can be made anytime unless all the Chaos' fragments are destroyed.

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
Thank you for the precious information.
I would like to meet him myself, but I can't face him.

${user_nick}$
Why do you say that?

$Heraldry Scholar Stas${action:Talk}
After the battle 50 years ago, I couldn't be on his side. When he disappeared without saying anything, I was filled with anger and shock.
...I didn't look at the reality rationally.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Wow~ you have a lot of worries.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
As a scholar, I shouldn't have done that. Concealing and forgetting incomprehensible phenomenon. When only the illusion of Six Heroes were all that was left....
I should have spoke out what I had seen. ...I should have done it then.
<html>$Quest Reward$</html>

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
Haha… are you trying to comfort me, young lady?
Thanks...

journal.title: Geraint Speaks I
journal.contents:
Listen to Velskud's story at the Foothills of Black Mountain.

Foothills of Black Mountain → Velskud
journal.destination: Talk to Velskud at the Foothills of Black Mountain

journal.title: Geraint Speaks II
journal.contents:
It seems Velskud has no intention of cooperating. Return to Saint Haven and report to Jasmine.

Saint Haven → Academic Station
journal.todo_msg: Connect to the Academic Station and report.

journal.title: Geraint Speaks III
journal.contents:
Return to the Royal Castle and see if there is anything new going on.

Saint Haven Royal Castle → Elite Soldier Calrim
journal.destination: Talk to someone at the Saint Haven Royal Castle
journal.todo_msg: Go to Saint Haven Royal Castle and see if there are any news.

journal.title: Geraint Speaks IV
journal.contents:
Heraldry Scholar Stas is looking for me. Meet him and find out what he has to say.

Saint Haven → Heraldry Scholar Stas

journal.title: Geraint Speaks V
journal.contents:
Heraldry Scholar Stas wants to know about dragons by asking Geraint. Go to Geraint and ask him what Stas wants to know.

Saint Haven Royal Castle (Secret Basement Area) → Geraint
journal.destination: Talk to Geraint at the secret area in the basement of the Royal Castle
journal.todo_msg: Meet Geraint and ask him Stas' question.

journal.title: Geraint Speaks VI
journal.contents:
Go to Heraldry Scholar Stas and tell him Geraint's response.

Saint Haven → Heraldry Scholar Stas
